I have a question. In a future version could Dataverse allowÂ collection adminsÂ (not just superusers) to choose theÂ PID providerÂ (e.g., DOI vs PermaLink)Â for their own collectionsâ€”at least forÂ drafts? This would let our stewards follow local policy without breaking our collection structure. What do you think ? If its possible to be considered is it best to open aÂ GitHub issue?

You're welcome to create an issue about this. The approach we take in cases like this is to split off a permission that is currently lumped in with another permission. For example, in 6.8 we split off the ability to link datasets and collections into their own permissions: #11691. (@Vera Clemens is the one who did the work, thanks!)

Thanks for creating this issue!
